alert.note: Alert for Pike; Walthall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 10:03AM CST until February 01 at 11:24AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Bogue Chitto River Near Tylertown affecting Pike and Walthall Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bogue Chitto River Near Bush affecting St. Tammany Parish. For the Bogue Chitto River...including Tylertown, Franklinton, Bush...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bogue Chitto River Near Tylertown. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Secondary roads in the vicinity of the river will flood. Homes close to the river and portions of the Hidden Springs Resort Park will be flooded. Low-lying farm and pasture land near the river will remain flooded. At 20.0 feet, Secondary roads in the vicinity of the river will flood. Homes close to the river and portions of the Hidden Springs Resort Park will be flooded. There will be widespread flooding of pasture and farm land. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CST Monday the stage was 18.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:45 AM CST Monday was 18.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 19.7 feet on 12/16/2009. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lix. Click on the Rivers and Lakes menu for forecasts and observations. The next statement will be issued when updates are needed.
